survey_properties.intro_message: Your feedback helps us to build a better mobile product.
survey_properties.end_message: Thank you for having the time to take our survey.

questions.question_title: How appreciated did your supervisor make you feel?
How easy was it to get along with the other colleagues at this organization?
You have some suggestions for improvement ?
How much you spend per coffee every day ?
Do you have any other comments you'd like us to know ?
